 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּא‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ezek.40.21|Ezek 40:21]]</sup> ==chamber== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, perhaps Aramaism, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dwell***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***abode*** (? akin to <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***turn aside to lodge***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַוְונָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lodging-place***), Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תָּוָן‎</span> (in [[Ezek.40|Ezek 40]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּוָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּוַיָּא‎</span>), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***room, chamber***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> absolute [[Ezek.40.7|Ezek 40:7]] +, construct [[1Kgs.4.28|1Kgs 4:28]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תאו‎</span> [[Ezek.40.21|Ezek 40:21]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּאָיו‎</span>), so v[[Ezek.40.29|Ezek 40:29]] v[[Ezek.40.33|Ezek 40:33]] v[[Ezek.40.36|Ezek 40:36]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּאִים‎</span> v[[Ezek.40.7|Ezek 40:7]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּאוֺת‎</span> v[[Ezek.40.12|Ezek 40:12]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּאֵי‎</span> v[[Ezek.40.10|Ezek 40:10]] — ***chamber:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרָצִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.4.28|1Kgs 4:28]] ***chamber of the guards*** = [[2Chr.12.11|2Chr 12:11]] in Ezekiel's temple: [[Ezek.40.7|Ezek 40:7]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.40.10|Ezek 40:10]]; [[Ezek.40.12|Ezek 40:12]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.40.13|Ezek 40:13]]; [[Ezek.40.16|Ezek 40:16]]; [[Ezek.40.21|Ezek 40:21]]; [[Ezek.40.29|Ezek 40:29]]; [[Ezek.40.33|Ezek 40:33]]; [[Ezek.40.36|Ezek 40:36]].
